translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen,
this is the moment we've been waiting for. The presenta--
translation.it: questo è il momento che stavamo aspettando…

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight?
-Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight! -[audience cheers]
Now, isn't this what it's all about, folks?
translation.it: Non vi sembra una magnifica notizia?

translation.en: [boy 1] Come on, Daniel! Come on, Daniel!
-Fight! -[Johnny] Hyah!
[man 1] Come on, Daniel! Get him!
[referee] Turn. Kneel.
[man 2] Hey, Johnny, you're a cream puff!
Sweep the leg.
You have a problem with that?
No mercy.
[boy 1] All right, two points!
That's two points, LaRusso. Lawrence, nothing.
Ready? Fight!
[referee] One point, Lawrence!
[official] Point, Lawrence. 2-2.
[boy 2] Get him a body bag! Yeah!
-[referee] Illegal contact to the knee. -[boy 2] Finish him, Johnny!
[announcer] Whoever wins the next point will be our new champion!
translation.it: Vince chi segna il prossimo punto.

translation.en: You finish him, Johnny! Finish him!
[announcer] The new champion, Daniel LaRusso!
Hey, I'm Miguel. My family and I just moved into 109.
translation.it: Sono Miguel. La mia famiglia si è trasferita al 109.

translation.en: Great. More immigrants.
Actually, we're from Riverside.
I was wondering if you were having trouble with your water pressure,
translation.it: Volevo sapere se aveva problemi con l'acqua.

translation.en: 'cause I know our sink's being weird right now and…
Oh, bottles go in the blue bins.
Listen, Menudo, I've lived in this shithole for over ten years.
translation.it: Senti, menudo. Vivo in questa topaia da più di dieci anni.

translation.en: The pipe's don't work. The fountain's full of piss.
translation.it: I tubi sono rotti. C'è piscio ovunque.

translation.en: The only good thing here is that I don't have to talk to anybody. So, nice knowing you.
translation.it: L'unico pro è che non devo parlare con nessuno. Arrivederci.

translation.en: OK, well…
have a nice day…
-[car door squeals loudly] -…I guess.
[Johnny] You've got to be kidding me.
Not another one.
♪ Ha ha, yeah! ♪
[woman] Creep.
Sick.
-Hey! -[kid] Gotcha.
-What the hell is this? -Don't worry, it'll be level.
I'm just lining it up.
You put it on the wrong wall! I said the wall across from the door.
translation.it: Avevo detto di montarla sulla parete di fronte alla porta.

translation.en: -This is the wall across from the door. -Not that door, idiot. The door.
translation.it: - È questa. - Non quella porta, idiota. Questa.

translation.en: Just move the TV. I have company coming over.
Hold on. I'll have to fill the holes, remeasure, match the paint.
translation.it: Aspetti! Devo riempire i buchi, riprendere le misure e pitturare.

translation.en: It'll take an hour to get to the hardware store.
That's not my problem.
I'm not the dummy who put the TV on, literally, the only wall in the house that a TV would not go.
translation.it: Non sono io l'idiota che ha messo la TV sull'unico muro su cui non andrebbe.

translation.en: Why can't a TV go on this…
Look, I'll come first thing in the morning and put it just the way you want it.
translation.it: Verrò domattina e monterò tutto come desidera.

translation.en: I just can't do it now.
That's just great. Not bad enough you took a shit in my powder room.
translation.it: Fantastico! E hai pure cagato nel mio bagno.

translation.en: -You said that's where I should go. -I didn't know you'd take a shit!
translation.it: - Mi ha detto di andare lì. - Non per cagare!

translation.en: OK, we'll figure this out, all right? Just quit bitching at me.
translation.it: Troveremo una soluzione, ok? Ora basta con queste stronzate.

translation.en: What did you just call me?
No, no, no! I didn't call her a bitch. I said she was bitching at me.
translation.it: Non le ho dato della stronza. Ho detto di smetterla con le stronzate.

translation.en: There's a difference.
You're firing me because of that bitch?
You know what? I hated this damn job anyway.
You better pay me what you owe me, Mike.
translation.it: Pagami quello che mi spetta, Mike.

translation.en: [man on radio] Banzai!
[chuckles] I'm Daniel LaRusso.
And at LaRusso Auto, we kick the competi--
translation.it: A LaRusso, prendiamo a calci la conc…

translation.en: That one.
Aren't you gonna wear gloves?
Can you put that on a plate?
[in English] My grandma's not feeling well.
translation.it: - Mia nonna non sta bene. - Non te l'ho chiesto.

translation.en: Didn't ask. C'mon, what's Spanish for "Just give me my damn slice"?
translation.it: - Mia nonna non sta bene. - Non te l'ho chiesto. Com'è in spagnolo: "Dammi la pizza"?

translation.en: [in English] What did you just say?
-What did he say? -You don't wanna know.
-I know it's something bad. Just tell me. -Uh, he said you have a tiny…
translation.it: - So che è un insulto. Dimmelo e basta. - Ha detto che lei ha un minuscolo…

translation.en: He said I have a tiny wang?
Tell him he has a tiny wang.
translation.it: - Digli che lo è anche il suo. - Ti capisco, stronzo.

translation.en: -[in English] I speak English, asshole. -Oh really?
translation.it: - Digli che lo è anche il suo. - Ti capisco, stronzo. Ah, sì?

translation.en: Yo, Brucks, get the light beer this time. Gotta cut weight for the meet.
translation.it: Brucks, prendi la birra light. Devi perdere peso.

translation.en: -Hundo P, son! -[boy 2] Damn right.
[boy 3] Man, you should get some condoms too.
Finish up and then beat it!
-Excuse me? -[woman] This is my mart.
You ain't hustling no coin at my mart.
I'm not hustling. I'm not homeless!
translation.it: Non lo sto facendo. Non sono un senzatetto.

translation.en: That's my car.
[boy 2] What the hell are you doing? Why you gotta blow up my spot?
translation.it: Ma che credi di fare? Vuoi fare la spia?

translation.en: -[Miguel] Dude, I-- -He thought we were in college.
[Miguel] I didn't know you were trying to buy beer. Sorry.
translation.it: Non sapevo che compravate la birra.

translation.en: -[Brucks] Yes, let's go. -[boy 3] What the hell are you doing?
translation.it: - Sì, così! - Che diavolo stai facendo?

translation.en: -Ooh, what do we got here? -[boy 4] What do you got? Pepto.
[boy 3] Oh shit. Someone has frickin' diarrhea!
translation.it: Accidenti, qualcuno qui ha la diarrea.

translation.en: [Brucks] Hey, we should call him 'Rhea.
Give it back, dude. It's for my grandma!
translation.it: - Dammelo. È per mia nonna. - Cosa…

translation.en: [boy 2] Oh, it's for your grandma? Shit, I'm sorry, man.
translation.it: Ah, è per tua nonna? Scusa, amico.

translation.en: Hey, you want it? Hey, you can take all that shit.
-Take that! Yeah. -[boys laughing]
Bitch.
Asshole.
-[Brucks] Ooh! -[boy 2] What'd you say, 'Rhea?
I… I didn't say anything.
[boy 4] That's brute, Ky.
[boy 3] Yeah. Or what?
-[Ky] You crying? Where you going, pussy? -[Miguel groans]
Watch the car, man.
Who's this dude?
-Just leave the dork alone. -[Ky] What?
You see this guy? Eating his dinner at the mini-mart like a bum.
translation.it: Ma guardalo! Mangia la cena fuori dal negozio, come un barbone.

translation.en: -[boys laugh] -[Ky] Wait, I think I know this guy. He's the jerk-off that cleaned my dad's septic tank.
translation.it: Forse lo conosco. È quello che ha pulito la nostra fossa biologica.

translation.en: That explains why he smells like shit.
Trust me, you are pissing off the wrong guy on the wrong day, all right?
translation.it: State irritando il tipo sbagliato nel giorno sbagliato.

translation.en: -[Ky] Really? -Yeah, really.
Get the hell out of here, loser.
Let's get him.
[Brucks] Get off me!
-Holy shit. How did you-- -[Ky roars]
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.it: Cosa c'è? Fai fatica a respirare?

translation.en: Is that all you got, ladies?
[Brucks] Come on, Ky.
-Let's go. -[Ky] Get off me!
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.it: Cosa c'è? Fai fatica a respirare?

translation.en: [cop] Hey, get off the kid!
-[Johnny screams] -[Miguel] Hey! It's not his fault!
[Miguel] Hey, I just wanted to say thank you.
All right, well, you said it.
So, last night, was that, like, Tae Kwon Do or jujitsu or MMA or something?
translation.it: Ieri sera, quello era taekwondo, jujitsu o qualcos'altro?

translation.en: It's karate. Old-school karate.
translation.it: Era karate. Il buon vecchio karate.

translation.en: -Do you think you could teach me? -What? No.
Come on. When school starts, those guys will make my life miserable.
translation.it: A scuola quelli mi renderanno la vita un inferno.

translation.en: It's not my problem.
Look, if I just knew a little bit of what you knew, then I would be--
translation.it: Se sapessi fare anche solo un po' di quello che fa lei…

translation.en: Forget it. I don't do karate anymore, all right? Besides, I need to find a job.
translation.it: Scordatelo. Non pratico più karate. E poi, ho bisogno di un lavoro.

translation.en: Well, you could open your own karate school.
translation.it: Potrebbe aprire una scuola di karate.

translation.en: -It's called a dojo. -You could open your own dojo.
translation.it: - Si chiama dojo. - Potrebbe aprire un dojo.

translation.en: Look, I'm not getting into this with you. I'm not even sure I'm allowed to be around kids right now.
translation.it: Non voglio immischiarmi. Non so neanche se posso stare con i ragazzi.

translation.en: All right, you want my advice? Stop being so annoying.
translation.it: Vuoi un consiglio? Smetti di essere irritante.

translation.en: Maybe you'll stop getting your ass kicked.
OK.
[woman on TV] …and have a life before I pass away. Any help Chuck can give her, we'd appreciate.
translation.it: L'imputato le ha estorto informazioni che non voleva rivelare?

translation.en: You got Encore?
Yes, ma'am. That's correct, Your Honor.
Who the hell are you?
You know those little red stickers that say "further reduced"?
translation.it: Hai presente quelle etichette rosse che dicono "prezzo ribassato"?

translation.en: That means "spoiled."
You know that, right?
You're eating bad meat, boy.
What the are you doing in my apartment, Sid? Oh, that's some "thank you."
translation.it: - Che ci fai nel mio appartamento, Sid? - Bel modo di ringraziarmi.

translation.en: Who do you think bailed you out? Again.
translation.it: Chi pensi ti abbia pagato la cauzione? Di nuovo.

translation.en: I never asked you for anything.
I think that little incident at Applebee's
translation.it: Pensavo che quel piccolo incidente al ristorante Applebee's

translation.en: would've taught you to keep your hands to yourself.
translation.it: ti avrebbe insegnato a tenere le mani a posto.

translation.en: You know…
when I met your mom,
she really knocked my socks off.
Beautiful.
Blonde.
Tan.
Tight.
-[groans] -[Sid] Little did I know I'd be taking care of her schmuck kid forever.
translation.it: Non pensavo che avrei dovuto badare per sempre al suo figlio cretino.

translation.en: [Johnny] Yeah, Sid, you were the stepfather of the century.
translation.it: Sì, sei stato il patrigno del secolo.

translation.en: Well, high praise,
coming from a world-class daddy like you.
translation.it: detto da un padre premio Nobel come te.

translation.en: How old is Robby now, 15, 16?
translation.it: Quanti anni ha Robby? Quindici? Sedici?

translation.en: -When's the last time you saw him? -Just get the hell out of here.
translation.it: - Da quanto tempo non lo vedi? - Vattene.

translation.en: I'll get the hell out when I'm goddamn good and ready!
translation.it: Me ne vado quando lo dico io!

translation.en: -[woman] Sid. -[Sid] What?
-Blood pressure! -Keep watching your bullshit judge show,
translation.it: - Sid! La pressione. - Cosa? Tu continua a guardare quella merda. Ok, Rhonda?

translation.en: will you, Rhonda?
translation.it: Tu continua a guardare quella merda. Ok, Rhonda?

translation.en: And stay out of this!
Jesus, God.
This is why I'm here.
translation.it: È per questo che sono qui.

translation.en: What's this?
You know, I told your mama I'd take care of you always,
translation.it: Dissi a tua madre che mi sarei sempre preso cura di te,

translation.en: but in this case,
I think even she would cut me some slack.
I'm buying you out of my life.
I'd rather be homeless than take money from you.
translation.it: Non accetto i tuoi soldi. - Piuttosto vado sotto a un ponte. - Oh, beh… Ok.

translation.en: Oh, well, hell. Yeah, OK.
translation.it: - Piuttosto vado sotto a un ponte. - Oh, beh… Ok.

translation.en: Lunchtime!
Call Art's.
See if they got the belly lox.
I'd say… get your life in order, but, uh…
translation.it: Mi verrebbe da dirti di rimetterti in carreggiata, ma…

translation.en: at this point, you're like the meat in your fridge.
translation.it: a questo punto, sei come quella carne nel frigo.

translation.en: Chappy! Chappy, where are you?
Just put in that tape. That's an order!
-Nothing you can do about me. -[man 1] Chappy, I want to help you! Where are you?
translation.it: - Non puoi fare nulla per me. - Voglio aiutarti! Dove sei?

translation.en: [Chappy] Climb high, like I told you!
-[alarm buzzing on television] -Doug, I ain't gonna make it.
-[explosion on television] -Chappy!
[man on tape] A bunch of things must have gone wrong if you're listening to this.
translation.it: Se mi stai ascoltando, molte cose saranno andate storte.

translation.en: Whatever happened, I know you must be real scared.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa sia successa, so che hai paura.

translation.en: Right now, you're probably filled with all the doubts in the world.
translation.it: In questo momento, sarai pieno di tutti i dubbi del mondo.

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you something, Dougie.
God doesn't give people things He doesn't want 'em to use.
translation.it: Dio non fa agli uomini regali che non vuole che usino.

translation.en: And He gave you the touch.
translation.it: E a te ha dato il tocco.

translation.en: It's a power you have inside of you, down there where you keep your guts, boy.
translation.it: È una forza che è dentro di te, dove hai il fegato, ragazzo.

translation.en: It's all you need to blast your way in and get back what they took from you.
translation.it: Basta quella per aprirti la strada e riprenderti ciò che ti hanno tolto.

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso here for LaRusso Auto,
bringing you specials on all of our inventory.
translation.it: vi propone delle offerte davvero speciali.

translation.en: We have an excess of Jeep Grand Cherokees priced to go.
translation.it: Abbiamo disponibili un gran numero di Jeep Grand Cherokee.

translation.en: Get a lease for only…
Nah. Make that…
Yes, we are chopping prices on all of our Hondas, Nissans, Acuras, and Audis.
translation.it: Spacchiamo i prezzi su tutte le Honda, Nissan, Acura e Audi.

translation.en: So come visit any of our locations in Tarzana, Woodland Hills,
translation.it: Venite nelle nostre sedi, a Tarzana, Woodland Hills,

translation.en: North Hollywood or Sherman Oaks.
And as always, every customer leaves with their very own bonsai tree.
translation.it: E, come sempre, ogni cliente si porterà a casa un bonsai.

translation.en: LaRusso Auto Group. We kick the competition.
translation.it: LaRusso Auto Group. Prendiamo a calci la concorrenza.

translation.en: -Yeah! -All right!
♪ These daydreams ♪
[Johnny] I got second place.
translation.it: - Sono arrivato secondo. - Secondo non esiste!

translation.en: [man] Second place is no place! You're off the team!
translation.it: - Sono arrivato secondo. - Secondo non esiste! - Sei fuori! - Ho fatto del mio meglio.

translation.en: -[Johnny] That sucks! I did my best. -What did you say?
translation.it: - Sei fuori! - Ho fatto del mio meglio. - Cosa? - Mi hai sentito.

translation.en: -[Johnny] I said I did my best! -You're nothing! You lost! You're a loser!
translation.it: - Cosa? - Mi hai sentito. Sei una nullità! Un perdente!

translation.en: -[Johnny] No, you're the loser, man. -Oh, I'm the loser, huh?
translation.it: - No, sei tu il perdente. - Ah, sì?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Now who's the loser? -[Johnny] You know, you're really sick.
translation.it: - Ora chi è il perdente? - Tu sei malato.

translation.en: -Hey! [Johnny choking] -Hey, come on!
-Hey, what are you doing? -Don't…
How does second place feel now, huh?
-[boy 1] Come on! He can't breathe. -Mind your business!
translation.it: - Non respira! - Fatti gli affari tuoi!

translation.en: [boy 2] You're gonna kill him! [boy 1] Sensei, please! You're hurting him!
translation.it: - Così lo ammazzi. - Sensei, gli stai facendo male!

translation.en: [man] How does second place feel now, huh?
-[girl gasps] -Oh my God. I told you, you shouldn't be on your phone.
translation.it: - Oddio! - Lascia stare il telefono mentre guidi!

translation.en: -What the-- -[liquor bottle smashes]
-What are we gonna do? -We have to call the police.
translation.it: - Che si fa? - Chiamiamo la polizia.

translation.en: -We can't! My parents will kill me! -What the hell are you doing?
translation.it: - I miei mi uccideranno. - Che state facendo?

translation.en: -What are you doing? Open the door! -[girls screaming] Open the door!
translation.it: Che state facendo? Aprite la portiera!

translation.en: Drive! Drive!
Hey! Where do you think you're going? Where do you think you're going?
Shit!
Oh, come o--
-Take care of her. She's a classic. -Mm-hmm.
-Hey, where do I pick it up? -It's on the card.
translation.it: - Dove passo a prenderla? - È scritto lì.

translation.en: [Johnny] LaRusso?
No, no, no.
Oh, come on.
How you doing? Would you be interested in--
[woman] You're all set.
-Have a great day. -[man 1] Thank you.
Hi, welcome to LaRusso.
How can I help you? Hi, I just need to pick up my car.
translation.it: - Come posso aiutarla? - Devo ritirare la mia auto.

translation.en: I'm in a bit of a hurry.
Oh, this came in last night?
It'll be a couple of weeks, but we'll call you with an estimate.
translation.it: Ci vorranno due settimane. Le faremo sapere.

translation.en: No, my car was not supposed to come here. I want it towed to a different body shop.
translation.it: No. Non dovevano portarla qui. La voglio trasportare altrove.

translation.en: Why?
We have the number one service team in the Valley.
We beat all prices. We kick the competition.
translation.it: Prezzi imbattibili. Prendiamo a calci la concorrenza.

translation.en: I've heard it a million times. I just prefer to do my business elsewhere.
translation.it: L'ho sentito mille volte. Ma vorrei andare altrove.

translation.en: [man 2] And here are the watering instructions. Thanks for being returning customers.
translation.it: Qui è scritto come innaffiare. Grazie per essere tornati da noi.

translation.en: Before you go, Mr. LaRusso wanted to thank you personally. Let me go get him.
translation.it: Il sig. LaRusso vorrebbe ringraziarvi personalmente. Lo chiamo subito.

translation.en: -Can you hurry it up? I gotta go. -[woman] Hold on.
Um, it says your car is in one of our intake lots.
translation.it: La sua auto è in un'officina.

translation.en: -I'll figure out which one. -You know what? I'll come back tomorrow.
translation.it: - Devo capire quale. - Ok, torno domani.

translation.en: [woman] But, sir, I--
[Daniel] Johnny?
Johnny Lawrence! I… I… I knew it was you!
translation.it: Johnny Lawrence. Sapevo che eri tu.

translation.en: Holy… How the hell are you?
-Hey, man. -[chuckles]
[Daniel] Oh my God, look at you.
You still got those golden locks, eh?
God, this is crazy. How you been?
-Great, man. Thanks, I've been great. -That's great.
Anoush, come here! Louie, get over here! I want you to meet somebody.
translation.it: Anoush, Louie, venite qui. Voglio presentarvi una persona.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -No, no, no. This is Johnny Lawrence.
translation.it: - Devo andare. - No. Lui è Johnny Lawrence.

translation.en: He and I go way back. Right, buddy?
translation.it: Ci conosciamo da tanto, giusto, amico?

translation.en: This guy was the toughest dude in my high school.
translation.it: Era il più duro del liceo.

translation.en: When I first moved here from Jersey, he and I… we got into a little bit.
translation.it: Quando mi sono trasferito qui, io e lui abbiamo litigato un po'.

translation.en: This guy really had it in for me.
Well, you did move in on my girl. Well, she actually wasn't really your girl anymore, was she?
translation.it: - Tu ci hai provato con la mia ragazza. - Beh, non era più la tua ragazza, giusto?

translation.en: I mean…
All right. That's all water under the bridge.
Wait. Is this the karate guy, the guy from the tournament? Oh, this is the guy whose ass you kicked.
translation.it: - Aspetta. È il tipo del torneo di karate? - Quello che hai preso a calci in culo.

translation.en: [Daniel] Uh, listen, it was a really close match.
translation.it: È stato un incontro molto combattuto,

translation.en: But if you wanna get technical… I kicked his face.
translation.it: ma l'ho preso a calci in faccia.

translation.en: -[Daniel, Louie laughing] -I'm just busting your chops.
It was an illegal kick.
Oh, illegal? Really? Come on. What about that elbow to my knee? Yeah, I got a warning. You got the win.
translation.it: - Davvero? E quella gomitata al ginocchio? - Ma io ho ricevuto un'ammonizione.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! No fighting in the showroom, guys.
[Daniel] Come on. All right, back to work.
-Nice meeting you. -Get back to work.
Enough reminiscing, right?
So, what brings you in? You're looking for a new a ride?
translation.it: Che ci fai qui? Cerchi un'auto nuova?

translation.en: He wants his car towed to a different body shop.
translation.it: Vuole portare la sua in un'altra officina.

translation.en: Oh no, Johnny. We got the best prices in town.
translation.it: No, siamo i migliori sulla piazza.

translation.en: That crook at Cole's on Van Nuys, he'll try to screw you over.
translation.it: Cole's a Van Nuys cercherà di fregarti.

translation.en: Sheila, let me see the estimate.
A Pontiac?
-Firebird? -Yeah.
Wow, someone did a real number on this thing.
Maybe it's time for an upgrade. Why don't we walk the lot?
translation.it: Perché non te ne cerchi una nuova?

translation.en: I'll give you a deal on a certified pre-owned--
I just want my car.
All right, all right. You got it, all right?
translation.it: Va bene. Come vuoi tu, ok?

translation.en: Let me see how low I can get this repair.
Friends and family… my own personal code.
translation.it: Per gli amici e la famiglia… Il mio codice.

translation.en: You know what? It's on the house.
-No way. I don't need your charity. -No, you'd be doing me a favor.
translation.it: - Non voglio la tua carità. - Mi faresti un favore.

translation.en: Our guys aren't used to working on a car like this. They could use the practice. You could use the repairs.
translation.it: Non lavoriamo su auto così. Potrebbero usarla per fare pratica.

translation.en: -This is a win-win. -I said I'll handle it.
All right.
OK, but it's… John, it's gonna cost more than the car is worth.
translation.it: Ok, ma il costo sarà superiore al valore dell'auto.

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about it. It's my pleasure, all right?
translation.it: Non ti preoccupare. Lo faccio con piacere.

translation.en: -All right. -OK? Just hang here a second.
I got something for you. One minute.
Fuck.
-Hey, Dad! -[Daniel] Look who's here.
-[screaming] -What are you doing? Open the door!
-I'm good. -You gotta be kidding me.
Of course. Go ahead. In the office.
-[girl] See you later. -OK.
Hey, Johnny, wait up! Johnny! Wait up.
Every customer gets one.
translation.it: Ogni cliente ne riceve uno. Tieni.

translation.en: And, hey, look, I don't blame you for what happened back in the day.
translation.it: E senti… Non ti incolpo per quello che è successo.

translation.en: All right, I know that wasn't you. It was Cobra Kai.
translation.it: So che non eri tu. Era il Cobra Kai.

translation.en: We're all better off without it, am I right?
Take care of yourself, and I'll call you when the car's ready, OK?
translation.it: Abbi cura di te. Ti chiamo quando l'auto è pronta, ok?

translation.en: This is crazy! You look… You look… It's good to see you, man.
translation.it: È pazzesco. Sei… È stato bello vederti.

translation.en: Are you sure you're ready?
'Cause once you go down this path, there's no turning back.
-You're gonna be my karate teacher? -No.
translation.it: - Sarà il mio maestro di karate? - No.

translation.en: I'm gonna be your sensei.
I'm gonna teach you the style of karate that was taught to me,
translation.it: Ti insegnerò lo stile di karate che imparai io,

translation.en: a method of fighting your pussy generation desperately needs.
translation.it: che alla vostra generazione di femminucce serve disperatamente.

translation.en: -[man] Good luck. It's all yours. -All right.
translation.it: Buona fortuna. È tutto tuo. Va bene.

translation.en: I'm not just gonna teach you how to conquer your fears.
translation.it: Non ti insegnerò come vincere le tue paure.

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you how to awaken the snake within you.
translation.it: Ti insegnerò come svegliare il serpente che è in te.

translation.en: And once you do that,
translation.it: E, dopo che lo farai, sarai tu a essere temuto.

translation.en: you'll be the one who's feared.
translation.it: E, dopo che lo farai, sarai tu a essere temuto. COLPIRE PER PRIMI - COLPIRE FORTE SENZA PIETÀ

translation.en: You'll build strength.
You'll learn discipline.
And when the time is right,
you'll strike back.
